Cube Decomposition Trophy

October 1, 2014

This is a 3D printed, three-piece cube decomposition model that can be transformed from a cube to a trophy for any given competition.

The model was originally made for the University of Georgiaâ€™s High School Math Tournament and was given away to the top scoring teams and participants.

The model features built-in holes for D6x1mm magnets (6mm diameter and 1mm height) that can be glued in after the print has completed. The additional color emphasizes the unique geometry of the middle piece. The model can be downloaded and printed from Thingiverse.

Links

  • Thingiverse Post
  • UGA High School Math Tournament
